name: Amphista Therapeutics
description: Amphista Therapeutics is developing medicines for hard-to-treat diseases using next-generation targeted protein degradation approaches.

name: Anaveon
description: Anaveon is developing no-alpha IL-2 receptor agonists for the treatment of cancer.

name: Anokion
description: Anokion is developing targeted therapeutics to treat autoimmune diseases.

name: Aravax
description: Aravax is a company focusing on peanut allergy intending to create immune tolerance.

name: Artios Pharma Limited
description: Artios Pharma is a clinical DNA damage response (DDR) company focused on developing first-in-class treatments for cancer.

name: Arvada Therapeutics
description: Arvada Therapeutics is developing large-molecule therapeutics to treat arrhythmogenic right ventricular cardiomyopathy/dysplasia (ARVC/D).

name: AstronauTx
description: A biotechnology company focused on correcting disrupted brain physiology to treat neurodegenerative disease.

name: Capstan Therapeutics
description: Capstan Therapeutics is a biotechnology company dedicated to advancing in vivo cell reprogramming.

name: CatalYm
description: CatalYm is developing innovative immunotherapies to transform the tumor microenvironment and substantially improve treatment options for cancer patients.

name: Enterprise Therapeutics
description: Enterprise Therapeutics is a drug discovery company dedicated to the research and development of novel therapies for the treatment of respiratory diseases.

name: Epsilogen
description: Epsilogen is a biotechnology company developing immunoglobulin E (IgE) antibodies to treat cancer.

name: Exo Therapeutics
description: Exo Therapeutics is developing small-molecule enzyme inhibitors that target distal binding pockets to reprogram enzyme activity with a focus on high-value oncology indications.

name: Expansion Therapeutics
description: Expansion Therapeutics is a drug discovery and development company pursuing the vast potential of small molecule medicines for RNA-mediated diseases.

name: Exsilio Therapeutics Inc
description: Inserting therapeutic genes precisely and durably into safe harbor sites in the human genome

name: Fore Biotherapeutics
description: Fore Biotherapeutics is developing breakthrough targeted medicines for precision oncology.

name: FoRx Therapeutics
description: FoRx Therapeutics focuses on the development of novel anti-cancer therapies by drugging molecular targets essential for cancer cells undergoing DNA replication stress.

name: FundaMental Pharma
description: FundaMental Pharma is a neuroscience company developing NMDA/TRPM4 interface inhibitors to stop neurodegeneration, restore function, and maintain brain health.

name: GentiBio
description: GentiBio engineers T cells to generate stable, scalable, IL2 and tissue targeted regulatory T cells better suited to address serious unmet medical needs for autoimmunity, alloimmunity, and autoinflammation.

name: Granite Bio
description: Granite Bio is a biotechnology company in the autoimmune/fibrosis therapeutics space developing novel treatments for inflammation and autoimmunity.

name: HYKU Biosciences
description: HYKU Biosciences is developing small-molecule covalent inhibitors targeting non-cysteine amino acids to address current challenges associated with many disease targets, including selectivity, druggability, and resistance.

name: Immunitas Therapeutics
description: Immunitas Therapeutics employs a single-cell genomics platform to dissect the biology of immune cells in human tumors and deliver meaningful clinical improvements.

name: LoQus23 Therapeutics
description: LoQus23 Therapeutics is focusing on targeting DNA damage repair pathways to effectively treat Huntington’s and other triplet repeat diseases.

name: Mediar Therapeutics
description: Mediar Therapeutics is a biotechnology company pioneering a new approach to fibrosis treatment.

name: ONL Therapeutics
description: ONL Therapeutics is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company developing first-in-class therapeutics to protect and improve the vision of patients with retinal disease.

name: Rappta Therapeutics
description: Rappta Therapeutics is a biopharmaceutical company developing a first-in-class series of anti-cancer molecular glues that reactivate protein phosphatase 2A (PP2A).

name: Redona Therapeutics
description: Redona Therapeutics is developing breakthrough medicines to exploit cancer’s vulnerabilities in gene expression.

name: RhyGaze
description: Gene therapy targeting cone cells

name: SpliceBio
description: SpliceBio is a biotechnology company exploiting protein splicing to develop the next generation of gene therapies for the treatment of inherited eye diseases.

name: Tagworks Pharmaceuticals
description: Tagworks Pharmaceuticals is a precision therapy company developing a new standard of care for patients suffering from severe diseases including cancer.

name: TigaTX
description: TigaTX is developing an IgA therapeutic monoclonal antibody platform to activate neutrophils for the treatment of solid tumors.

name: Vivet Therapeutics SAS
description: Vivet Therapeutics SAS focuses on the discovery and clinical development of gene therapy and protein replacement therapy for inherited metabolic liver diseases.
